verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

\w If|strong="H1121"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* does wrong, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* untrue \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord, acting falsely \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbour \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w connection|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* something \w put|strong="H6680"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w care|strong="H5921"\w*, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* something \w given|strong="H6680"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* debt, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w has|strong="H0784"\w* taken \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w anything|strong="H3605"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* force, \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w has|strong="H0784"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* cruel \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* neighbour,

\w Or|strong="H0398"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* \w taken|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* false oath \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* loss \w of|strong="H4196"\w* something \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* come \w across|strong="H5921"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* chance; \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H7760"\w* \w man|strong="H1320"\w* \w has|strong="H0834"\w* done \w any|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w these|strong="H0834"\w* evil \w things|strong="H0834"\w*,

Causing sin \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w then|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w will|strong="H4725"\w* have \w to|strong="H0413"\w* give \w back|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* thing \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* force or \w got|strong="H3318"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* cruel acts, or \w the|strong="H0853"\w* goods which \w were|strong="H1880"\w* \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0413"\w* care or \w the|strong="H0853"\w* thing \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w by|strong="H0413"\w* chance,

\w Or|strong="H3808"\w* \w anything|strong="H3808"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* took \w a|strong="H5921"\w* false oath; \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H0784"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* give \w it|strong="H5921"\w* all back, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w addition|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* fifth \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w its|strong="H5921"\w* value, \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* whose property \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3548"\w*, \w when|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H0784"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* judged \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wrong.

\w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* take \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w the|strong="H5921"\w* offering \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* wrongdoing; giving \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* priest \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* offering, \w a|strong="H5921"\w* male sheep \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* flock, \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* mark, \w of|strong="H4196"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* value fixed \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*:

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* priest \w will|strong="H3068"\w* take away \w his|strong="H3068"\w* sin \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* forgiveness \w for|strong="H0413"\w* whatever crime \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* done
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Moses,

\w Give|strong="H0398"\w* orders \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H4480"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, saying, \w This|strong="H0398"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* law \w for|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* burned \w offering|strong="H4480"\w*: \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w offering|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fire-wood \w on|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* altar \w all|strong="H0398"\w* night till \w the|strong="H4480"\w* morning; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w fire|strong="H0398"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* altar \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w kept|strong="H0398"\w* burning.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* priest \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* linen robes \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* linen trousers, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* what \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w offering|strong="H0801"\w* after \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w has|strong="H5414"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* burned \w on|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w by|strong="H0801"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* side \w of|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar.

\w Then|strong="H3068"\w* having taken \w off|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* linen robes \w and|strong="H1121"\w* put \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* clothing, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* take \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w away|strong="H3605"\w* into \w a|strong="H0834"\w* clean \w place|strong="H3605"\w*, outside \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tent-circle.

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* fire \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* altar \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* kept burning; \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* never \w to|strong="H0413"\w* go \w out|strong="H0413"\w*; every morning \w the|strong="H0559"\w* priest \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* put wood \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w*, placing \w the|strong="H0559"\w* burned \w offering|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w order|strong="H0559"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* fat \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* peace-offering \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* burned.

Let \w the|strong="H0853"\w* fire \w be|strong="H1121"\w* kept burning \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w times|strong="H3117"\w*; \w it|strong="H7126"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* never \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H7126"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* law \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w meal|strong="H4503"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*: \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* altar \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sons \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Aaron.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* take \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* hand some \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* meal \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* meal \w offering|strong="H6999"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* oil \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3632"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* perfume \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w*, \w burning|strong="H6999"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sign, \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sweet smell \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w whatever|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w over|strong="H3605"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w food|strong="H0398"\w*, taking \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* leaven \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* holy \w place|strong="H1961"\w*; \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* open space \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3605"\w* meeting \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w meal|strong="H4503"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w*.

\w It|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* not \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* cooked \w with|strong="H0413"\w* leaven. \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* given \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* part \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*; \w it|strong="H1696"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* most holy, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* sin-offerings \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* error.

Every \w male|strong="H1121"\w* \w among|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* food; \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H0175"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* ever \w through|strong="H0413"\w* all \w your|strong="H3068"\w* generations, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w anyone|strong="H0834"\w* touching \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.
\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord said \w to|strong="H4725"\w* Moses,

\w This|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* offering \w which|strong="H0834"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1818"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* make \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* day \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w made|strong="H6942"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* priest: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tenth \w part|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w an|strong="H5921"\w* ephah \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* best meal \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* meal offering \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w ever|strong="H1320"\w*; half \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* morning \w and|strong="H1818"\w* half \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* evening.

Let \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w made|strong="H0834"\w* \w with|strong="H3627"\w* oil \w on|strong="H3627"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* flat plate; \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w well|strong="H0834"\w* mixed \w and|strong="H4325"\w* cooked, let \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H4325"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* taken \w in|strong="H7665"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* meal offering, \w for|strong="H4325"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* sweet smell \w to|strong="H4325"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* Lord.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w offering|strong="H3548"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* given \w by|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w who|strong="H3605"\w* takes \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w place|strong="H6944"\w* \w as|strong="H0398"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*; \w by|strong="H3605"\w* an order \w for|strong="H3605"\w* ever, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w to|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* burned before \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord.

\w Every|strong="H3605"\w* meal \w offering|strong="H3722"\w* offered \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* priest \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w completely|strong="H3605"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w*: \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0168"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* taken \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w food|strong="H0398"\w*.
And the Lord said to Moses,
Say to Aaron and his sons, This is the law for the sin-offering: the sin-offering is to be put to death before the Lord in the same place as the burned offering; it is most holy.
The priest by whom it is offered for sin, is to take it for his food in a holy place, in the open space of the Tent of meeting.
Anyone touching the flesh of it will be holy: and if any of the blood is dropped on any clothing, the thing on which the blood has been dropped is to be washed in a holy place.
But the vessel of earth in which the flesh was cooked is to be broken; or if a brass vessel was used, it is to be rubbed clean and washed out with water.
Every male among the priests may take it for his food: it is most holy.
No sin-offering, the blood of which is taken into the Tent of meeting, to take away sin in the holy place, may be used for food: it is to be burned with fire.
